description: Truffles contain a high amount of protein and are very good for vegetarians.
Protein can range from 20 to 30 percent per cup.
It is important for muscle mass and bone health.
Truffles also contain up to 20 grams of fiber in a cup! Adults require a total of 25 to 38 grams of fiber a day to keep the body healthy.
Truffles are a good source of vitamin D since they produce vitamin D.
